Intellect Pummel.name: Intellect Pummel
Intellect Pummel.flavor: Your attack may not be as potent as an illithid’s mind blast, but you’re satisfied to see your foes stumble about at your whim.
Intellect Pummel.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Intellect Pummel.special: You can use your spirit companion’s square as the origin for this attack.

Total Subjugation.name: Total Subjugation
Total Subjugation.flavor: Your spirit companion engulfs your enemy completely, controlling its movement as you control its mind.
Total Subjugation.effect: If your spirit companion is adjacent to the target at the start of its turn, you can slide the target up to 4 squares and slide your spirit companion up to 4 squares to a square adjacent to the target. This effect persists only while the target is dazed or dominated by this power.

Minion's Shield.name: Minion's Shield
Minion's Shield.flavor: As the attack speeds towards you, you decide that your spirit companion should take the blow instead.
Minion's Shield.trigger: You take damage from an attack while your spirit companion is adjacent to you.
Minion's Shield.effect: Your spirit companion takes the damage instead of you.
